comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Decision Variables:
  - x: Number of pill A to be consumed
  - y: Number of pill B to be consumed

- Objective Function:
  - Minimize Z = 4x + 5y

- Constraints:
  - 3x + 6y \geq 40 (minimum 40 units of sleep-inducing medicine)
  - 5x + y \geq 50 (minimum 50 units of anti-inflammatory medicine)
  - x \geq 0
  - y \geq 0

- Constants:
  - Cost per pill A: $4
  - Cost per pill B: $5
